resources.string: Tap again to exit the app
Username must be longer than 5 characters
Log in with your Creator Account

If you don\'t already know the password for your WiFIRE\'s wifi setup mode you\'ll need to connect a USB micro cable to the UART header and run a terminal package on your computer (115200,8,n,1). For more information see the WiFIRE section of docs.creatordev.io
To setup a fresh board or re-run setup process on board press button below.
If you have a configured board please ensure it is powered before hitting the RETRY button.

The Creator WiFIRE Mobile application can be used to configure a Digilent WiFIRE development board with the Creator IoT framework. Use the mobile application to sign up for a Creator account, configure the WiFi connection on your WiFIRE board, and to register the board to your account.

For more information about Creator or the Creator WiFIRE mobile and embedded applications visit docs.creatordev.io where you\'ll find step by step guides to download and install the embedded code on the WiFIRE board as well as details about the Creator IoT framework.

Setup will connect your WiFire board onto %s, so that it can communicate with Creator Device Server.
No WiFi detected. Please connect the mobile to a WiFi network to perform the device setup.
Select the device that you want to set up.
Networking Error. Check if you are connected to board\'s WiFi network
Error connecting to the WiFIRE board. Retry the WiFIRE’s password or check that WiFi is connected to your WiFIRE
MakeItFlow has to restart for reinitialize Flow Cloud connection.
Enter Wi-Fi setup mode by holding down the two buttons highlighted above and pressing the RESET button. Release the buttons when LD1 starts to flash.
Please enter the password for your device
Please enter the password for your

If LD1 or LD3 are flashing, Wi-Fi failed to connect. Please retry.

 If LD4 is WiFire may have troubles connecting to Creator Device Server. Continue to wait or retry.
Your Device is taking a long time to connect to FlowCloud
Do you wish to connect your device to a network?
You are connected to your device
Your device went offline. You cannot interact with it anymore.
Back to \"Set up a device\" screen
Scanning for WiFIRE boards running the Creator Wifire App in setup mode
Network configuration of %s must be completed in the Android WiFi settings. Go to WiFi settings and forget that network before continuing
Unable to connect to Creator Device Server. Please check your Wi-Fi connection to ensure you have access to the internet.
The email or password that you entered is incorrect.
Account already in use. Enter another username or email address.
User with specified name not found.
Android M prevents apps from scanning for available wifi networks unless the Location service mode is enabled.
Please enable Location from your device\'s settings to ensure WiFire boards will be found during a WiFi scan.
